meanings.sent1: The walls in the kitchen are scrubbable, so I can easily clean off any stains.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to buy scrubbable paint for my house, as it makes cleaning much simpler.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's cape was made of scrubbable material, in case it got dirty during battles.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like a scrubbable surface, always ready to wipe away any negativity.
meanings.sent5: The new car had a scrubbable interior, perfect for families with messy kids.

meanings.definition: Capable of being cleaned by scrubbing
meanings.sent1: The stain on the carpet was not scrubbable, no matter how hard I tried.
meanings.sent2: The pots and pans were all scrubbable, making dishwashing a breeze.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the rug was a giant scrubbable toy and kept rolling on it.
meanings.sent4: His memory was like a scrubbable whiteboard, easily erased and rewritten.
meanings.sent5: The tough stains on the floor were no match for the scrubbable cleaner I used.
